subject: Playoff Games
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dirk Nowitzki — relatively new father and old hand in the postseason after missing it last year for the first time since 2000 — is just happy to be back in the N.B.A. playoffs.
snippet: Dirk Nowitzki — relatively new father and old hand in the postseason after missing it last year for the first time since 2000 — is just happy to be back in the N.B.A. playoffs.
